entries.name: asn1_flag → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the flags set on the group.

entries.name: asn1_flag = flagsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets flags on the group. The flag value is used to determine how to encode the group: encode explicit parameters or named curve using an OID.

entries.name: get_cofactor   => cofactor_bnclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the cofactor of the group.

entries.name: degree   => integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for EC_GROUP_get_degree()

entries.name: eql?(group2)   => true | falseclick to toggle source
generator   => ec_pointclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the generator of the group.

entries.name: get_order   => order_bnclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the order of the group.

entries.name: point_conversion_form → Symbolclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the form how EC::Point data is encoded as ASN.1.

entries.name: point_conversion_form = formclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets the form how EC::Point data is encoded as ASN.1 as defined in X9.62.

entries.name: seed   => String or nilclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for EC_GROUP_get0_seed()

entries.name: seed = seed  => seedclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for EC_GROUP_set_seed()

entries.name: set_generator(generator, order, cofactor)   => selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets the curve parameters. generator must be an instance of EC::Point that is on the curve. order and cofactor are integers.

entries.name: to_der   => Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for i2d_ECPKParameters_bio()

entries.name: to_pem   => Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for PEM_write_bio_ECPKParameters()

entries.name: to_text   => Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: See the OpenSSL documentation for ECPKParameters_print()
